definition[0]: to become something different, or to make someone or something do this
example[0]: The sofa turns into a bed.
example[1]: A few weeks later, winter had turned into spring.
example[2]: Hollywood discovered her and turned her into a star.
definition[1]: to change by magic from one thing into another, or to make something do this
example[3]: In a flash, the prince turned into a frog.
example[4]: The witch had turned them all into stone.
definition[2]: used to say that time passed slowly while you waited for something to happen
example[5]: Weeks turned into months, and still there was no letter.
